com.ddtek.xquery
Interface CollectionURIResolver

public interface CollectionURIResolver

An object that implements this interface can be called by DataDirect XQuery to convert a file collection URI used in a call to fn:collection(), into a set of Source objects.

Method Summary
 Iterator resolve(String href, String base)
          Called when a fn:collection() function is encountered.
 

Method Detail

resolve

Iterator resolve(String href,
                 String base)
                 throws TransformerException
Called when a fn:collection() function is encountered.

Parameters:
href - An href attribute, which may be relative or absolute. This argument is null for a call to the default collection.
base - The base URI against which the first argument is made absolute if the absolute URI is required or null if no base URI is known.
Returns:
An Iterator over the documents in the collection. The items returned in this iterator must be supported instances of Source. If null is returned, the system attempts to resolve the URI using the default collection URI resolver.
Throws:
TransformerException - if an error occurs when trying to resolve the URI.
